conversations.body_text:
Hi I am unable to log in to view or edit the ticket due to my order being
placed through Shop. If it has not been cancelled yet I can continue with
the order. The only reason for cancellation was the delivery time as I saw
it had not shipped yet, but if I can receive it by the end of next week
it's not a problem. Order #SSN5984

Thanks

On Thu, 15 Jan 2026 at 14:25, service@simsonn.com

Hi G J,     We have confirmed that your order has been scheduled for shipment and will be dispatched from our US warehouse on the 19th. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, and we will address them promptly.
